attributes.action: Stop any development of Sizewell as a nuclear plant.
attributes.background: EDF connected with French Government plan re-commission of Sizewell, Suffolk as nuclear plant.  East coast UK perfect for natural wind farm energy.  Nuclear plants pose many dangers for our small island and planet.  No companies should build here, foreign companies can build on their own soil.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

EDF Energy already operates a nuclear power station at Sizewell, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you're concerned about foreign companies building new nuclear power stations at Sizewell or if you're concerned about new nuclear powers stations more broadly. We're also not sure if you're calling for the Government to fund wind farms on the east coast. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
